meaningMnemonic: Remember blood pressure (血圧)? Well, now the blood pressure is <kanji>tall</kanji>... so you have "tall blood pressure." Well that's dumb. Let's call it <vocabulary>high blood pressure</vocabulary> instead.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
